admob_app_id.description: AdMob App ID for runtime override (empty = use manifest value). Format: ca-app-pub-XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX~YYYYYYYYYY

ad_frequency_seconds.description: Minimum seconds between App Open and Interstitial ads (frequency capping)

premium_mode.description: Premium mode: 'true' = IAP paywall required, 'false' = unlock by watching ads

ads_mode.description: Global ad kill switch: 'true' = show ads normally, 'false' = disable all ads and preloading
